title: Software Development Engineer - Location Technologies
summary: Our mission is to personalize the user experience on Apple devices based on where you go, when, and what those places mean to you. Seeking motivated, experienced technical leaders to help take software to the next level.
description: In this job, you’ll develop the next frontier of mobile technology, in partnership with teams in sensing, Siri, and apps. Conceptualize, explore, and define new inferential and predictive location- and motion-based capabilities. Design algorithms, integrate them into production code, test and iterate.
key_qualifications: Real passion for the location domain. 5+ years experience developing commercial software. Working knowledge of statistics fundamentals. Ability to evaluate and optimize for system performance. Proven track record working effectively across teams. Experience processing real-world data at scale, server-side.
preferred_qualifications: Experience with Spark, Hadoop, or NoSQL data stores.
education_experience: BS, MS, or PhD in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or a similar field
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. Base pay range for this role is between $143,100 and $264,200. Apple employees also have the opportunity to become an Apple shareholder. Benefits include comprehensive medical and dental coverage, retirement benefits, discounted products and free services, educational expense reimbursement, and more.
